sentences.en: A desperate tiredness set in after hours of anxious waiting.

sentences.cn: 汽车厂商拼命想要实现规模经济。

sentences.en: Desperate with anxiety, Bob and Hans searched the whole house.
sentences.cn: 焦急万分的鲍勃和汉斯把整座房子找了个遍。

sentences.en: Even if you are desperate to get married, never let it show.
sentences.cn: 即使你想结婚想得发狂，也决不要表现出来。

sentences.en: He careened through foreign territories on a desperate kind of blitz.
sentences.cn: 在孤注一掷地闪电战中他猛冲过外国领地.

sentences.en: He is desperate to pursue his vocation as an artist.
sentences.cn: 他不顾一切地从事艺术的职业.

sentences.cn: 我身无分文，已经走投无路了。

sentences.cn: 这是她记录的档案中最严重的案例之一。

sentences.cn: 他们为挽救公司作孤注一掷的努力.

sentences.cn: 他们拼命想要瞒住这桩婚事。

sentences.cn: 时间越来越少，我们越来越感到绝望。

sentences.en: We’re in desperate need of help.
